newsData.title: تغییر معادلات بازارهای جهانی و داخلی در پی تجاوز نظامی اسرائیل به ایران
newsData.summary: تجاوز نظامی اسرائیل به ایران، معادلات بازارهای جهانی و داخلی را تغییر داد و نوسان مقطعی در بازار ارز تهران غیرقابل اجتناب است.

newsData.title: تجاوز نظامی اسرائیل به ایران، معادلات بازارهای جهانی و داخلی را تغییر داد.

newsData.title: ‘Unprecedented’ Investment Fund Seals Deal for Japan and Expands Trump’s Influence
newsData.summary: President Trump will get to decide where to invest Japanese money and the United States will keep 90 percent of the profits, the White House said.

newsData.title: Stock Market Posts Worst Week in Months on Renewed Economic Fears
newsData.summary: Data showing cracks in the U.S. labor market and President Trump’s newest barrage of tariffs shook investors around the world, weighing on stocks, the dollar and more.

newsData.title: Trump Targets Copper With Tariffs, Though Not as Aggressively as Expected
newsData.summary: The president stopped short of putting a 50 percent tariff on refined copper, as he had threatened earlier this year. The market reaction was swift anyway and prices tumbled.
